channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NYC mayoral election live results: 3 ways to follow the high-stakes New York City race in real time
item.description: New Yorkers are heading to the polls Tuesday to cast their ballots for the city’s next mayor. And it’s not just NYC that’s invested. The Democratic pr...

item.title: WeWork Co-Founder Adam Neumann, Known for Toxic Leadership, Is Still Giving Business Advice
item.description: On a recent a16z podcast, Neumann said he was doing things differently with his latest company, Flow.

item.title: The unsung author of L’Oreal’s iconic ‘because I’m worth it’ tagline finally gets her due

item.title: These Founders Predict AI Will Be a ‘Great Leveler’ That Delivers a ‘Very Hard Job Market’
item.description: Jacqueline Samira of Howdy.com and Isa Watson of Squad share their strategies for embracing artificial intelligence.

item.title: Gen-Z Is Becoming the ‘Toolbelt Generation.’ That Could Hurt Your Hiring Chances
item.description: The newest group of entrants to the workforce arrives with a healthy fear of AI, and some radically different beliefs about their career paths.

item.title: Trump’s chip tariff threat sparks pushback from auto industry to tech
item.description: The possible levy of up to 25% has united rivals like Tesla, General Motors, and Ford in voicing reservations.

item.title: A federal judge says training AI on copyrighted works is ‘fair use,’ but casts doubt on use of pirated materials
item.description: Training AI on books Anthropic bought is ok, but downloading pirated ones is not, judge says

item.title: Here’s Why Your Business Should Outsource Accounting
item.description: Emotional ties and trust issues can get in the way of making smart financial decisions.

item.title: How Roblox handles millions of players on viral games like ‘Grow a Garden’
item.description: Just this past weekend, social and gaming platform Roblox saw a peak of 30.6 million concurrently active players, the company announced Tuesday . One ...

item.title: CareerBuilder + Monster job search board files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy after revenue sinks nearly 40% post-pandemic
item.description: CareerBuilder + Monster, an online job hunting joint venture, announced on Tuesday it filed for bankruptcy in Delaware. The company initiated the Chap...

item.title: Red Lobster hopes Crabfest can claw back diners this summer

item.title: Anthropic Wins Key Ruling on AI in Authors’ Copyright Lawsuit
item.description: AI companies argue that their systems make fair use of copyrighted material to create new, transformative content.

item.title: Emirates, Qatar Airways, and other major airlines are cancelling flights and halting routes amid uncertainty from U.S. strikes and a shaky Israel-Iran ceasefire deal
item.description: Airports and skies throughout the region have been on edge since Israel began the deadly war on June 13.

item.title: Crypto market bounces back after President Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran
item.description: The crypto market added 2% to its market cap between Monday night and Tuesday afternoon.

item.title: Uber and Waymo are rolling out robotaxi services in Atlanta as competition heats up with Elon Musk’s Tesla
item.description: Waymo's driverless march into Atlanta comes just days after Tesla finally launched a limited robotaxi service in Austin.
